Container.Name: Copyparty
Container.Overview:
### 💾🎉 copyparty
turn almost any device into a file server with resumable uploads/downloads using *any* (https://github.com/9001/copyparty/blob/hovudstraum/README.md#browser-support) web browser
A full list of the feature set can be found here https://github.com/9001/copyparty/blob/hovudstraum/README.md#features
Container.Category: Productivity: Tools:Utilities MediaApp:Video MediaApp:Music MediaApp:Books MediaApp:Photos MediaApp:Other Network:Web Network:FTP
Container.Requires:
The server needs a .conf file or arguments to run, a basic docker config can be found here https://github.com/9001/copyparty/blob/hovudstraum/docs/examples/docker/basic-docker-compose/copyparty.conf
An extensive example configuation can be found here: https://github.com/9001/copyparty/blob/hovudstraum/docs/example.conf
